verses.verse: I say <S%G3004><s%> then, <S%G3767><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has not rejected <S%G683><s%> His people, <S%G2992><s%> has He? May it never <S%G3361><s%> be! For I too <S%G2532><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> an Israelite, <S%G2475><s%> a descendant <S%G4690><s%> of Abraham, <S%G11><s%> of the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Benjamin. <S%G958><s%>

God <S%G2316><s%> has not rejected <S%G683><s%> His people <S%G2992><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> He foreknew. <S%G4267><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> do you not know <S%G3609><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the Scripture <S%G1124><s%> says <S%G3004><s%> in [the passage about] Elijah, <S%G2243><s%> how <S%G5613><s%> he pleads <S%G1793><s%> with God <S%G2316><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> Israel <S%G2474><s%>?

"Lord, <S%G2962><s%> they have killed <S%G615><s%> Thy prophets, <S%G4396><s%> they have torn <S%G2679><s%> down <S%G2679><s%> Thine <S%G4771><s%> altars, <S%G2379><s%> and I alone <S%G3441><s%> am left, <S%G5275><s%> and they are seeking <S%G2212><s%> my life. <S%G5590><s%>"

But what <S%G5101><s%> is the divine <S%G5538><s%> response <S%G5538><s%> to him? "I have kept <S%G2641><s%> for Myself <S%G1683><s%> seven <S%G2035><s%> thousand <S%G2035><s%> men <S%G435><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> have not bowed <S%G2578><s%> the knee <S%G1119><s%> to Baal. <S%G896><s%>"

In the same <S%G3779><s%> way <S%G3779><s%> then, <S%G3767><s%> there has also <S%G2532><s%> come <S%G1096><s%> to be at the present <S%G3568><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> a remnant <S%G3005><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to [God's] gracious <S%G5485><s%> choice. <S%G1589><s%>

But if <S%G1487><s%> it is by grace, <S%G5485><s%> it is no <S%G3765><s%> longer <S%G3765><s%> on the basis <S%G1537><s%> of works, <S%G2041><s%> otherwise <S%G1893><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> is no <S%G3765><s%> longer <S%G3765><s%> grace. <S%G5485><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>? That which <S%G3739><s%> Israel <S%G2474><s%> is seeking <S%G1934><s%> for, it has not obtained, <S%G2013><s%> but those <S%G1589><s%> who were chosen <S%G1589><s%> obtained <S%G2013><s%> it, and the rest <S%G3062><s%> were hardened; <S%G4456><s%>

just <S%G2509><s%> as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> "God <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> them a spirit <S%G4151><s%> of stupor, <S%G2659><s%> Eyes <S%G3788><s%> to see <S%G991><s%> not and ears <S%G3775><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%> not, Down <S%G2193><s%> to this <S%G4594><s%> very <S%G4594><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>"

And David <S%G7035><s%> says, <S%G3004><s%> "Let their table <S%G5132><s%> become <S%G1096><s%> a snare <S%G3803><s%> and a trap, <S%G2339><s%> And a stumbling <S%G4625><s%> block <S%G4625><s%> and a retribution <S%G468><s%> to them.
"Let their eyes <S%G3788><s%> be darkened <S%G4654><s%> to see <S%G991><s%> not, And bend <S%G4781><s%> their backs <S%G3577><s%> forever. <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3956><s%>"

I say <S%G3004><s%> then, <S%G3767><s%> they did not stumble <S%G4417><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> as to fall, <S%G4098><s%> did they? May it never <S%G3361><s%> be! But by their transgression <S%G3900><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> [has come] to the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> to make <S%G3863><s%> them jealous. <S%G3863><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> their transgression <S%G3900><s%> be riches <S%G4149><s%> for the world <S%G2889><s%> and their failure <S%G2275><s%> be riches <S%G4149><s%> for the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> how <S%G4214><s%> much <S%G4214><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> will their fulfillment <S%G4138><s%> be!

But I am speaking <S%G3004><s%> to you who are Gentiles. <S%G1484><s%> Inasmuch <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3745><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> as I am <S%G1510><s%> an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> I magnify <S%G1392><s%> my ministry, <S%G1248><s%>
if <S%G1487><s%> somehow <S%G4458><s%> I might move <S%G3863><s%> to jealousy <S%G3863><s%> my fellow <S%G4561><s%> countrymen <S%G4561><s%> and save <S%G4982><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of them.

For if <S%G1487><s%> their rejection <S%G580><s%> be the reconciliation <S%G2643><s%> of the world, <S%G2889><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> will [their] acceptance <S%G4356><s%> be but life <S%G2222><s%> from the dead <S%G3498><s%>?

And if <S%G1487><s%> the first <S%G536><s%> piece <S%G536><s%> [of dough] be holy, <S%G40><s%> the lump <S%G5445><s%> is also; <S%G2532><s%> and if <S%G1487><s%> the root <S%G4491><s%> be holy, <S%G40><s%> the branches <S%G2798><s%> are too. <S%G2532><s%>

But if <S%G1487><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of the branches <S%G2798><s%> were broken <S%G1575><s%> off, <S%G1575><s%> and you, being <S%G1510><s%> a wild <S%G65><s%> olive, <S%G65><s%> were grafted <S%G1461><s%> in among <S%G1722><s%> them and became <S%G1096><s%> partaker <S%G4791><s%> with them of the rich <S%G4096><s%> root <S%G4491><s%> of the olive <S%G1636><s%> tree, <S%G1636><s%>

do not be arrogant <S%G2620><s%> toward <S%G2620><s%> the branches; <S%G2798><s%> but if <S%G1487><s%> you are arrogant, <S%G2620><s%> [remember that] it is not you who supports <S%G941><s%> the root, <S%G4491><s%> but the root <S%G4491><s%> [supports] you.
You will say <S%G3004><s%> then, <S%G3767><s%> "Branches <S%G2798><s%> were broken <S%G1575><s%> off <S%G1575><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that I might be grafted <S%G1461><s%> in."

Quite <S%G2573><s%> right, <S%G2573><s%> they were broken <S%G1575><s%> off <S%G1575><s%> for their unbelief, <S%G570><s%> but you stand <S%G2476><s%> by your faith. <S%G4102><s%> Do not be conceited, <S%G5426><s%> <S%G5308><s%> but fear; <S%G5399><s%>
for if <S%G1487><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> did not spare <S%G5339><s%> the natural <S%G5449><s%> branches, <S%G2798><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> will He spare <S%G5339><s%> you.

Behold <S%G3708><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> the kindness <S%G5544><s%> and severity <S%G663><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who fell, <S%G4098><s%> severity, <S%G663><s%> but to you, God's kindness, <S%G5544><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you continue <S%G1961><s%> in His kindness; <S%G5544><s%> otherwise <S%G1893><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> will be cut <S%G1581><s%> off. <S%G1581><s%>

And they also, <S%G2548><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> they do not continue <S%G1961><s%> in their unbelief, <S%G570><s%> will be grafted <S%G1461><s%> in; for God <S%G2316><s%> is able <S%G1415><s%> to graft <S%G1461><s%> them in again. <S%G3825><s%>

For if <S%G1437><s%> you were cut <S%G1581><s%> off <S%G1581><s%> from what <S%G65><s%> is by nature <S%G5449><s%> a wild <S%G65><s%> olive <S%G65><s%> tree, <S%G65><s%> and were grafted <S%G1461><s%> contrary <S%G3844><s%> to nature <S%G5449><s%> into a cultivated <S%G2565><s%> olive <S%G2565><s%> tree, <S%G2565><s%> how <S%G4214><s%> much <S%G4214><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> shall these <S%G3778><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> are the natural <S%G2596><s%> <S%G5449><s%> [branches] be grafted <S%G1461><s%> into their own <S%G2398><s%> olive <S%G1636><s%> tree <S%G1636><s%>?

For I do not want <S%G2309><s%> you, brethren, <S%G80><s%> to be uninformed <S%G50><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> mystery, <S%G3466><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> you be wise <S%G5429><s%> in your own <S%G1438><s%> estimation, <S%G1438><s%> that a partial <S%G3313><s%> hardening <S%G4457><s%> has happened <S%G1096><s%> to Israel <S%G2474><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the fulness <S%G4138><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> has come <S%G1525><s%> in;

and thus <S%G3779><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> Israel <S%G2474><s%> will be saved; <S%G4982><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> "The Deliverer <S%G4506><s%> will come <S%G2240><s%> from Zion, <S%G4622><s%> He will remove <S%G654><s%> ungodliness <S%G763><s%> from Jacob. <S%G2384><s%>"
"And this <S%G3778><s%> is My covenant <S%G1242><s%> with them, When <S%G3752><s%> I take <S%G851><s%> away <S%G851><s%> their sins. <S%G266><s%>"

From the standpoint <S%G2596><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%> they are enemies <S%G2190><s%> for your sake, <S%G1223><s%> but from the standpoint <S%G2596><s%> of [God's] choice <S%G1589><s%> they are beloved <S%G27><s%> for the sake <S%G1223><s%> of the fathers; <S%G3962><s%>
for the gifts <S%G5486><s%> and the calling <S%G2821><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> are irrevocable. <S%G278><s%>

For just <S%G5618><s%> as you once <S%G4218><s%> were disobedient <S%G544><s%> to God, <S%G2316><s%> but now <S%G3568><s%> have been shown <S%G1653><s%> mercy <S%G1653><s%> because of their disobedience, <S%G543><s%>

so <S%G3779><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> have been disobedient, <S%G544><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that because of the mercy <S%G1656><s%> shown to you they also <S%G2532><s%> may now <S%G3568><s%> be shown <S%G1653><s%> mercy. <S%G1653><s%>
For God <S%G2316><s%> has shut <S%G4788><s%> up all <S%G3956><s%> in disobedience <S%G543><s%> that He might show <S%G1653><s%> mercy <S%G1653><s%> to all. <S%G3956><s%>

Oh, <S%G5599><s%> the depth <S%G899><s%> of the riches <S%G4149><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> of the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> and knowledge <S%G1108><s%> of God! <S%G2316><s%> How <S%G5613><s%> unsearchable <S%G419><s%> are His judgments <S%G2917><s%> and unfathomable <S%G421><s%> His ways! <S%G3598><s%>
For who <S%G5101><s%> has known <S%G1097><s%> the mind <S%G3563><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> His counselor <S%G4825><s%>?
Or <S%G2228><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> has first <S%G4272><s%> given <S%G4272><s%> to Him that it might be paid <S%G467><s%> back <S%G467><s%> to him again?
For from Him and through <S%G1223><s%> Him and to Him are all <S%G3956><s%> things. <S%G3956><s%> To Him [be] the glory <S%G1391><s%> forever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
